title: Digital Storytelling-Based Mathematical Affective Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge at the primary and secondary education levels
context.additional_context: Microlearning program for relearning mathematical concepts to enhance workplace efficiency, utilizing digital storytelling to strengthen emotional engagement in a mobile-based learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain mathematical problem-solving processes in digitally presented workplace scenarios with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can achieve an average score of ≥3.5 (on a 4-point scale) for emotional responses (empathy/engagement) in storytelling-based formative assessments.
Learners can improve self-reflection and emotional awareness levels by ≥20% compared to baseline when writing storytelling assignments incorporating mathematical concepts.

resources: Formative assessment tools with sentiment analysis capabilities

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
